data.text: @VicGovDH What if you’re still symptomatic (respiratory symptoms)?
@laurenbrii @VicGovDH Or you just do the same thing as with all communicable diseases and tell the school about your child having covid like a normal parent

@VicGovDH New Data Shows Pfizer’s Covid Vaccine For Kids 5 To 11 Offers Little Protection

https://t.co/FRUgwI1UnZ
@VicGovDH If your child tests positive does the sibling also isolate if they are negative

@VicGovDH I know it’s important for camps but knowing we are in a pandemic why is school camps allowed? One camp has become a super spreader sending many families into isolation with vulnerable kids. Think beyond the square when making decisions
@pokerspudda @MixtUpMixy @VicGovDH @LongCovidKids For sure mate, you've done everything they told you to do now just get on with life

@PeterPeterV20 @VicGovDH They went to my neighbours house and asked for my daughter by her full name to make sure she was isolating 😬. My neighbourhood doesn’t need to know my daughter has Covid. People are judgemental enough as it is. @VicGovDH reply to my complaint you grubs.
@VicGovDH And this should state 'the whole household required to isolate for 7 days'.

@VicGovDH We have boxes of tests...never testing, never wearing a mask. Never vaccinating my kids....

Guess what? No covid.
